data.description:
## Overview
The TX backend is fully functional. Legacy event-sourced backend can be removed (~2200 lines).

## Classes to Remove

### EventLog (lines 332-1094, ~762 lines)
- Purpose: Append-only event log for event-sourced backend
- Methods: log_node_create, log_edge_create, log_decision, rebuild_graph_from_events, compact_events
- No longer needed: TX backend uses versioned_store.py with ACID transactions

### HandoffManager (lines 1095-1209, ~114 lines)  
- Uses EventLog for handoff operations
- TX adapter already has handoff methods (initiate_handoff, accept_handoff, complete_handoff)
- Can be removed after verifying adapter methods work

### GoTProjectManager (lines 2575-4047, ~1473 lines)
- Main class for event-sourced backend
- All functionality exists in TransactionalGoTAdapter
- Uses ThoughtGraph in-memory with EventLog for persistence

### TaskMigrator (lines 4020-4105, ~85 lines)
- One-time migration utility
- Can be archived but not critical

## CLI Commands Using EventLog Directly
- cmd_migrate_events (line 4693): Uses EventLog.load_all_events()
- cmd_validate (line 5249): Uses EventLog.load_all_events()
- cmd_compact (line 5366): Uses EventLog methods
- cmd_handoff_* (lines 5037-5130): Uses HandoffManager(manager.event_log)

## Test Files Needing Updates
1. tests/behavioral/test_got_workflow.py - Uses GoTProjectManager
2. tests/integration/test_got_handoffs.py - Uses EventLog
3. tests/regression/test_got_edge_rebuild.py - Tests EventLog.rebuild_graph_from_events
4. tests/unit/test_got_cli.py - Mocks GoTProjectManager
5. tests/unit/test_got_query.py - Uses GoTProjectManager
6. tests/unit/test_process_lock.py - May use event log

## Approach (Recommended)
1. First fix EdgeType enum (dependency - edges must load correctly)
2. Verify all TX adapter methods work via integration tests
3. Update CLI commands one by one to not use EventLog
4. Remove classes in order: HandoffManager -> EventLog -> GoTProjectManager
5. Update/delete obsolete tests

## Factory Already Updated
GoTBackendFactory.create() now always returns TransactionalGoTAdapter (commit 71e97f5)

## Verification
python -m pytest tests/unit/got/ tests/smoke/ -v  # Should pass after cleanup
data.title: Remove deprecated EventLog and GoTProjectManager classes
